alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 12:00PM EST until January 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY CONTINUES UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Grayson County. In North Carolina, Watauga and Ashe Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory is issued when strong winds will combine with cold temperatures for several hours to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
